body.name: GREENZLA Kids Bamboo Toothbrushes (6 Pack) BPA Free Soft Bristles Eco-Friendly, Natural Toothbrush Set Biodegradable & Compostable Charcoal Wooden
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 37 mins
features: Sustainable Oral Care. Our bamboo toothbrushes for kids feature 100% biodegradable handles. The kids toothbrush set of 6 comes in all-natural compostable product packaging you can discard guilt-free.
Little Teeth, Big Smiles. The BPA-free charcoal-infused soft bristles on our wooden toothbrushes are gentle on delicate gums and teeth. Kids love their small size, color-coded handles and bristles.
Made to Last. Our kids bamboo toothbrushes have strong handles and sturdy bristles that can last for 8-12 months. Take proper care of your toothbrush for kids by storing it in a dry open-aired place.
Happy Brushing. The ergonomic bamboo handles on our toddler toothbrush is great for small kids with tiny hands. Make daily oral hygiene a joyful habit with our easy to grip and use kids toothbrushes.

Quality You Can Trust. Greenzla's zero waste products are made from high-quality materials for sustainable living. Browse through our green and clean selection of dental hygiene products for all ages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good toothbrushes for kids/toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: I have a 10 year old, 8 year old, and 4 year old that use these. They are perfect for all of them cause they fit in their hands perfectly. Not too big or too small. The bristles are soft but not too soft to where you have to worry about it not brushing and not too hard to where it’s uncomfortable. It’s the perfect softness. The colors are bright and really pretty and the wood of the brushes is stable! I love how they come with so many cause we always have extras on hand for when they get sick and we have to replace their toothbrushes. My kids were super excited to pick out their colors also! Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these! Soft gentle bristles
reviews.reviewText: The colors are fun and my kid loves them. I like them because the bristles are super soft yet actually do the job to scrub and polish kids’ teeth. The perfect everyday kids’ toothbrush-and we’ve tried most brands both standard and electric! It leaves teeth clean but is gentle on gums. The bristles are also very flexible so it really looks like it gets between teeth better than other toothbrushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little tooth brushes
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is thrilled with these. The bristles are very soft and the size is perfect for a child. Also very light weight. The bristles are holding up well after a few weeks of use. The only minor issue is that leftover toothpaste tends to get stuck in between the bristles because it sticks to the wood. Nothing a thorough rinse with warm water can’t take care of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, round handle is tricky
reviews.reviewText: These are great quality bamboo toothbrushes with fun colors. The one issue we had is that the round handles make it hard for our daughter to put on her toothpaste (she likes to set it down and use both hands to squeeze the tube), or to set the brush down with toothpaste on it, because it rolls over and gets on the counter. We found another brand with a flat handle that’s easier to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BAMBOO TOOTHBRUSHES FOR KIDS ARE GREAT FOR ADULTS!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these toothbrushes. My hygienist said that I should try using a child's toothbrush when not using my electric toothbrush, because my teeth are small and so is the arched space behind my front upper and lower teeth. She gave me a free plastic child's toothbrush, which was easier to use and fit in my mouth better. But it was silly looking with cartoon characters on it and the plastic was just tacky. I bought these bamboo brushes and I am so pleased! They feel great in the mouth and in the hand. They do a great job. They are attractive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable little toothbrushes.
reviews.reviewText: These are great. They are easy for my toddler to use. The bristles are nice and soft so when he messes up and brushes his cheek, he doesn't scratch himself. They are also very aesthetically pleasing to look at in my kids bathroom, even if they are left on the floor. I will definitely order them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The minute I took the tooth brush out of the box my kids wanted to brush their teeth. They love the colors on it and the feel of the toothbrush is great. I highly recommend this brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the look of these and my kids were really excited about the colors and that each box was a little surprise of what color they were going to get. A couple downsides: the toothbrush doesn’t lay flat to put toothpaste on. It rolls to its side because they are round. Another downside we had happen was the backside of one of ours developed black mold. I’ve never had that happen with a toothbrush before. We keep it inside our medicine cabinet on a hanging holder so I started leaving it out to “dry” on the counter before putting it away.

Li trovo perfetti per i denti dei bimbi, sia come dimensioni che come delicatezza delle setole, che però hanno la giusta durezza perché puliscono bene e durano a lungo restando in ottime condizioni igieniche. Fondo del manico e setole colorate molto apprezzati.
Los niños estaban encantados de tener varías opciones para elegir y los colores son muy bonitos 🤍🤎

~ Descriptions du produit ~- C’est un pack qui comprend 6 brosses à dents en bambou spécialement conçues pour les enfants.- Format mini- Fabriquées à partir de bambou 100 % biodégradable et durable- Sont respectueuses de l'environnement- Sans BPA (substance chimique largement utilisée dans la fabrication de plastiques et de résines comme les brosses a dents traditionnelles), ce qui les rend sûres pour une utilisation par les enfants.~ Facilité d’utilisation ~- Simple- Il suffit de suivre ses propres habitudes d'hygiène bucco-dentaire.~ Rapport qualité prix ~- Bien- Des couleurs différentes pour différentes brosses a dents~ Mon avis ~- Les poils de ces brosses à dents sont souples- On retrouve un nettoyage efficace des dents.- Je recommande fortement

I am eager to find a sustainable toothbrush option that doesn’t leave behind micro plastics but this isn’t it. The bristles were too harsh on my gums, leaving my gums sore for an hour every time I used it. On my third use some bristles fell out and I almost swallowed them. I would say for someone without sensitive gums it might be an option, but if you also have dental concerns in addition to environment friendly aspirations then I would keep looking.
Pratique, jolie, convient parfaitement à mon garçon de 7 ans
